amendment.description: Amendment adresses forum selection for claims from foreign maritime crews.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 115-217 to address forum selection for claims from foreign maritime crews.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 190 (Roll no. 375).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Hunter.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 190 (Roll no. 375).

Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
